name: Captain Bryan Langford
title: Owner and Managing Director
bio: Born and educated in Kingston Jamaica, 30+ years experience as a Merchant Marine Captain & experience in maritime shipping operations, as well as marine engineering, demolition, lifting, surveying and dredging operations.

name: Peter Wilson-Kelly
title: Resources Impact Mitigation Specialist
bio: A Commercial Diver, Marine Ecologist, Coastal Zone Management and Remote Sensing specialist with over 20 years working experience in both fields. A former employee of the National Environment and Planning Agency and an ex Navy diver.
